I arrived at the school shortly after, but my sister was nowhere to be found, we share the same home room so it was odd that she wasn't in attendance because shes such a honor roll geek. I then decide to check the parking lot for *REDACTED*'s car, and low and behold there it was, it was parked right under the shade of the big oak tree to the side of the lot.
I decided to walk over there to see if they were still in there, as I was walking I could see two figures in the car, as I got closer I could hear moaning, "SHE MUST BE GETTING RAPED" I thought So I ran. When I got there it I hide behind the car as I prepared my attack on *REDACTED*. It was at this moment, it became clear, I heard my sister screaming "KIMOCHI II"! My sister was absolutely enjoying it, she loved riding his cock. At this realization I decided to slowly back off from the car and then proceed to run back to class with tears streaming down my eyes.
Now my mother AND my sister were taken away from me, KILL ALL CUCKS.

It was just like this, I remember it as if it was yesterday, I was still in highschool at the time and I had a HUGE crush on my sister, she had pretty brown hair and she loved frogs. She had a great sense of humor and had eyes that could steal any boy's soul *swoon*.

One morning as I was walking to school with her, I had finally decided to confess my burning incestuous love for her.
I have been contemplating on my decision for months now, and today was the day. This burden will finally be lifted, and my soul shall be free.

Just as I was about to grab that ass and give her my punchiline, a hideous looking fellow by the name of *REDACTED* decide to pull up in his new car and asked my sister if she needed a ride to our school, she agreed without hesitation, and just as I was going to enter *REDACTED* slammed the door and speed off with the love of my life.
